metadata.name: HAQ
metadata.description:
This is a part of the first set of NFTs by the Fearless Collective.

Artist 
Madiha Khan + The Fearless Collective

Over the last few years, vocal and assertive Muslim women have woken up in India to find their names on Auctioning apps - from Sulli Deals to Bulli Bai, being lathi charged, locked up in jails, harassed and much more. Efforts are continuously made to dehumanise, discourage and remove them from all spaces- from schools and workplaces, to social media.  This portrait highlights the fierceness, power of Maliha, a young Muslim woman and was made as a step towards reclaiming the virtual spaces that are being snatched from women like her.
